    • Constructor Detail

      • MedicalItem

        public MedicalItem​(java.lang.String name,
                   int price,
                   java.lang.String description,
                   int restoreHealthAmount,
                   boolean removePlague)
        Creates a medical item.
        Parameters:
        name - A string name of the medical item.
        price - An int of the medical item price.
        description - A string description of the medical item.
        restoreHealthAmount - An int of restore health amount when the medical item is consumed.
        removePlague - A boolean expression of whether the medical item is a cure to the space plague.

    • Method Detail

      • setRestoreHealthAmount

        public void setRestoreHealthAmount​(int restoreHealthAmount)
        Sets the restore health amount of the medical item.
        Parameters:
        restoreHealthAmount - An int of restore health amount when the medical item is consumed.

      • isRemovePlague

        public boolean isRemovePlague()
        Checks if the medical item is the cure to the space plague.
        Returns:
        True if the medical item is the cure to the space plague, false otherwise.

      • setRemovePlague

        public void setRemovePlague​(boolean removePlague)
        Sets the medical item as the cure to the space plague.
        Parameters:
        removePlague - A boolean expression of whether the medical item is a cure to the space plague.
